sources.title: Kidnapped In Romania | Full Crime Drama Movie
sources.description:

Kidnapped In Romania - A couple of Italo-American journalists go missing during their work assignment in Romania.

2016
Stars: Michael Madsen, Andrea Stefancikova, Paul Sorvino

metadata.Plot: Devastated by the First World War and plunged into political controversy, Romania's every hope accompanies its queen on her mission to Paris to lobby for international recognition of its great unification at the 1919 peace talks.
metadata.Writer: Gabi Antal, Alexis Cahill, Brigitte Drodtloff
metadata.Actors: Roxana Lupu, Daniel Plier, Richard Elfyn
